content.rendered:
Requirements

We are searching for a highly motivated individual who is articulate, professional and possesses excellent interpersonal skills.

  • Degree Or Equivalent Work Experience Preferred
  • Minimum of 1-3 years previous experience in a highly detailed administrative or customer service, inside sales or account management role, education or benefits
  • Must be a self-starter and possess excellent time-management skills
  • Must be detail-oriented
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills are a must
  • Must be open-minded with a willingness to learn
  • Must be goal-oriented
  • Dynamic, ambitious, and able to work well independently as well as within a team environment
  • If anyone is interested kindly send your updated resume to jobopenings@irez.in

excerpt.rendered: Requirements We are searching for a highly motivated individual who is articulate, professional and possesses excellent interpersonal skills.
